TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AudioConfig extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class AudioConfig Implements IDisposable

Docs.summary: Represents audio input configuration used for specifying what type of input to use (microphone, file, stream).

Docs.summary: Dispose of associated resources. We may or may not dispose the audio stream, depending if we are told we own the stream give to us.
